title: how do i change back to the old client
body: the legacy client thing in the login screen wont show up

replies.body: As of April 7th 2017, the legacy client is no longer available for the OCE server. There were several factors that went into making this decision, which you can read up on in our article about why the [**legacy client**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/client-beta-update-2-replacing-legacy-client-1?utm_source=air-landingpage&utm_campaign=tier1clientcomparisonfeb2017&utm_medium=air) is going away.
honestly all i want are custom item sets i keep forgetting to try new builds and these will remind me i dont see how item sets will affect gameplay negatively
We're still working on bringing custom item sets into the new client. I don't have an exact date quite yet, but we're definitely working on it!

I wonder how many of these you and Porocles will have to respond to when that goes global.
Gonna wear out those Ctrl C/V keys out a few times. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}
